channel.title: Random double hitting and no spirites?
channel.description: Hey Guys im new to coding and im learning fast! but i have two things that are bugging me! one is that the a normal weapon hits twice for no reason? here a picture... [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2r2tzyx.png[/img] and also i have a source with no spirites but i would like to change the hp bar to a more mordener one! :D please help!
